OCR_info.question_text: 다음 중 나눗셈에서 몫의 위치가 바르게 된 것은 어느 것입니까? ①$ \begin{array}{r} 30\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,60\phantom{)}}}\\  \\  \end{array} $  ②$ \begin{array}{r} 30\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,60 \ \ \phantom{)}}}\\  \\  \end{array} $ ③ $ \begin{array}{r} 30 \ \ \phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,60 \phantom{)}}}\\  \\  \end{array} $④ $ \begin{array}{r} 3 \ \ \phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,60\phantom{)}}}\\  \\  \end{array} ⑤ \begin{array}{r} 3\phantom{)} \\ 2{\overline{\smash{\big)}\,60\phantom{)}}}\\  \\  \end{array} $
